page.title: 05City Directa U.K.
page.content: Jill Baker is the secretary of City Directa. She answered our questions . There are 25 people working in the City Directa 2 of whom live in Cold Norton.Their main product are tapes that are of all sorts and sizes and different colours.They roughly deal with 25 orders a day. City Directa has been operating for 15 years. They have another company in London.The Cold Norton factory has been open for about 4 years. Before the present factory was opened the site was used as a petrol staion.
